summary: Enhanced healthcare outcomes within the addiction treatment space by performing research and providing relevant, authentic and critically appraised content on substance abuse, addiction and treatment-related issues, such as substance abuse effects, rehabilitation, and recovery. Drove brand awareness by producing detailed and insightful editing, providing medically and scientifically sound references, and offering improvement recommendations to optimize content and syntax.

company: Philips Institute of Oral & Craniofacial Molecular Biology
summary: Investigated the virulence and mechanisms needed for establishment, growth, and survival of these bacteria. Utilized various techniques to complete tasks including Electroporation, Polymerase chain reaction, Sequencing, Sodium Dodecyl Sulfate Polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis (SDS-Page), Western Blotting, and DNA/protein extraction.

Investigated the phenomena of auditory and visual perceptual organization. Co-created and conducted a sensory integration experiment at the University of Virginia by examining an interesting musical illusion in which vision influences perceived tone duration.
